modName: Duration Tweak - Night Eye and Hunters Sight
summary: This is a simple mod; it merely increases the duration of both the Kahjiit and Werewolf\'s Night Eye and Vampire\'s Hunter Sight from 1 minute to 1 hour.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod; it merely increases the duration of both the Kahjiit and Werewolf\'s Night Eye and Vampire\'s Hunter Sight from 1 minute to 1 hour. No other changes were made.

It is also available on the Steam Workshop, if you prefer:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=78806416

Compatible with any mod that doesn\'t alter these base refs:
000AA01D PowerKhajiitNightEye
000C4DE1 VampireHuntersSight
0006B10E WerewolfNightEye

I also recommend BaconCat\'s \"Nighteye Muted or Quieter Sound\" available on the Skyrim Nexus. It does not appear to be available via the Workshop. It will remove or reduce in volume the activation/deactivation sound for anything that uses the NightEye effect. Get it here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7892
author: draeath

files.name: Duration Tweak - Night Eye and Hunters Sight
